title: Curse of the Pink Panties [2007 - USA] gangster action comedy
description:
Curse of the Pink Panties (2007 - USA)

Action / Comedy / Crime

Cranium Candy Entertainment Production Company
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1042879/


Director Kirk Bowman is clearly firing on all cylinders with this landmark film. Curse of the Pink Panties is the first of his films to nab decent distribution and get widely, and positively, reviewed, and it's easy to see why. The title says it all, really. Imagine, a loony crime caper film with a plot that hinges entirely on the cotton-clad crotches of lithesome young ladies, a film with no actual nudity to speak of, but with a literal ass-load of scenes featuring wiggling panty girls. Scenes that could put your average adolescent boy into a self-induced coma. That, friends, is what we are dealing with here. Plot? Sure, we've got that, of a sort. After dying during a gun fight, a bunch of gangsters have their spirits trapped inside panties. Remarkably, this movie was followed up with Snatched! Curse of the Pink Panties II in 2010.


Video: XviD, 512x384, 23.976 fps, 1169 Kbps, 01h17m56s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
